Download clinical data

```{r}
library(readxl)
cdr <- read_xlsx("data/raw/TCGA-CDR-SupplementalTableS1.xlsx")
cdr_coad <- subset(cdr, type == "COAD")
saveRDS(cdr_coad, "data/raw/TCGA-COAD.rds")
```

```{r}
colnames(cdr_coad)
table(cdr_coad$type)
table(cdr_coad$treatment_outcome_first_course)
```
